name: No.14 Lovel St Guesthouse
description:
•	500m / 8min walk from Katoomba railway station
•	Unrestricted free street parking. No on-site parking.
•	Self-catering fully equipped kitchen with plenty of space.
•	Central heating & gas fireplace for cooler weather, fans for warmer weather. No Aircon.
•	Ecotourism Australia certified Nature Tourism.
•	5bed dorms and private rooms share bathroom. 11 rooms, 20 beds, maximum 28 people

Included for FREE:
•	Bag storage before check in, from 9am-5pm (6pm Sat/Sun) at Blue Mountains Bag Storage (closed Tue/Wed - don't worry, we've got you covered!)
•	Bag storage / hang out up to 1pm after check at 10am. However, you must return your keys by 10am.
•	WiFi
•	Towel hire
•	Earplugs 
•	Sunscreen & bug spray available for guest use
•	Teabags, instant coffee, sugar available all day
•	Full / skim / soy milk available all day
•	Cornflakes / oats / muesli available all day
•	Salt, pepper, cooking oil, various spices.
•	Cling wrap, aluminium foil (perfect for packing lunches)

Available for additional charge:
•	After FREE bag storage until 1pm on checkout, discounted flat rate of $10/bag at Blue Mountains Bag Storage, one minute from the train station
•	There's also a $5/hour/item rate Blue Mountains Bag Storage if that's all you don't need more than that extra hour after check out.
•	Discounted rates for Out of the Blue private transport and tours. 100% where you want to go, when you want to go there. Up to four people can share.
•	Laundry $4/wash including powder $4/dry 
•	Cookies & cake for charity fundraising

Please note:
•	We do our absolute best to provide all the information you need before you stay with us. Your booking is subject to our terms and following house rules.
•	No TVs, music etc is on purpose, so please don't listen to your own stuff on speaker. 
•	Quiet hours 10pm-7am. Verandah/deck outside areas are off limits for anything other than total silence after 10pm. 
•	We have a maximum total stay of 7 nights.
•	Full house private rentals are for all ages. Individual guesthouse bookings are 16yrs+ (18yrs+ for shared dorms).
•	We need a mobile phone contact, especially in case of emergency (or you forget to return your keys).
•	Keys not returned to the office by checkout incur a $50 charge; lost keys incur a $250 charge. 
•	We have a contactless self-check-in process to give our guests maximum flexibility. 
•	Hostelworld have advised us to advise this in our terms, despite the platform being different: Full payment is processed before check-in in NOT "ON ARRIVAL". We will authorise your card 3 days before check-in to allow for any issues and capture payment 2 days before arrival, when we enter our non-refundable period.  
•	Your payment to us is 100% refundable up until 2 days before check-in. The non-refundable period applies to the entire booking. For example, if you're check in on the 10th, then you have until the night of the 7th to cancel for free. From the 8th, it will become non-refundable.

groupInformation.terms:
ALL group bookings are subject to the owner's discretion. 

You will be sent our full terms and conditions. A deposit is required to confirm the booking.
groupInformation.cancellationTerms:
Cancellation / No Show - off peak 
100% refund 4 weeks prior
50% refund 14 days prior
No refund for cancellation after those dates. 

Special events eg UTA and peak seasons, vary. Contact us for information.
groupInformation.additionalTerms:
While groups may bring their own music etc. No parties or events. I've had to clarify this to previous groups - large groups who want to drink all day and continue after 10pm are not welcome. Quiet hours 10pm  until 7am apply, in respect of our neighbours. This is mostly on the verandah, but noise transfer from inside as well. 

Failure to respect our house rules will result in immediate termination of your booking and be evicted, forfeiting any refund.

houseRules.notes:
HOSTELWORLD CHANGES
Hostelworld system doesn’t sync on a few things with our policies. Hostelworld suggest we add an important note or "Term & Conditions" to mention the related information. And let the guests know to avoid generating issue bookings.
1.	Cancellation for the entire booking is free up to 2 days prior. 
2.	Once non-refundable, the entire booking is non-refundable.
3.	Payment is charged to the supplied card 2 days prior to check in and authorized 3 days prior.
4.	Unless different on our own website for last minute changes, Friday and Saturday are a booking block together. Check in and check out are not generally permitted on Saturdays. As advised by Hostelworld, we will contact you to change to either a Friday or Sunday check in or out. 

YOUR RESPONSIBILITIES
•	You are responsible for reading email information and house rules. Your booking is reliant on this information and house rules.
•	We need a mobile phone contact, especially in case of emergency (like you forgot to return your keys). Otherwise you are responsible to be checking your emails.
•	We have a zero tolerance for entitled rude or anti-social behaviour. You will forfeit your booking and receive no refund when evicted.

PAYMENT & CANCELLATION
•	All payment are charged to credit cards as we have a contactless check in process and 2 day non-refundable cancellation period. 

CHECK IN
•	You may check in from 2pm, and late check in is also possible. After 10pm, please be considerate of other guests and be very quiet, in particular in dorms.
•	Contactless self check in is easy. We'll email you instructions at 11am on the day of check in. Reception desk is open in the mornings until 1pm, often we’re around throughout the afternoon and we are available by mobile for inhouse guests 24 hours for anything urgent.

CHECK OUT
•	You may leave before reception at No.14 and/or Blue Mountains Bag Storage near the station open at 9am. Bags can be stored in a cupboard in the library if necessary until 1pm. You still must return your keys at No.14 before you leave. Ring the doorbell to get back in before 1pm.  Tuesdays & Wednesdays, you may store you stuff at No.14 until 5pm because the Bag Storage shop is closed.
•	Keys not returned to the office by 10am checkout incur a $50 charge, lost keys incur a $250 charge. 

PEACE & QUITE - NOT A PARTY HOSTEL
•	No TVs, music etc is on purpose, so please don't listen to your own stuff on speaker. 
•	We are not a party hostel. Our house Is over 110 Years old and noise travels easily here at night. Quiet hours are from 10pm to 7am. This includes in your room as well as common areas. The outside deck and verandah are off limits unless in total silence after 10pm, in respect of our neighbours.

CHILD POLICY
•	We do not accommodate babies or children for individual guesthouse bookings.  This policy is not negotiable on arrival or if discovered during your stay. You will forfeit your payment and must leave. 
•	All ages are welcome for full house private bookings only, not individual guesthouse room bookings.

NO LONG TERM ACCOMMODATION
•	We do not provide long term accommodation, or work-for-accommodation arrangements. 
•	You may book for a maximum stay of seven (7) nights.

categories.category_description: This hostel has begun to introduce practices that result in a positive social and environmental impact, grasping the fundamentals of the Staircase to Sustainability.
